name: artsymblog
description: ```bash cd s4lab_project git clone git@bitbucket.org:corvet/s4lab_20180101_docker_symfony.git ./ git remote remove origin sudo chmod -R 777 ./ cd docker_symfony/ docker-compose down docker-compose up -d --build docker exec -it s4lab_php_fpm bash composer install ``` ## Setup connection for database file __.env__ ```bash DATABASE_URL=mysql://db_user:db_password@mysql:3306/db_name ```
